item.title: Trump Meeting With Saudi Prince Showcased Prince’s Makeover — and America’s
item.description: Prince Mohammed was briefly a global pariah after the killing of a Saudi dissident. But over the years he has rebuilt his image as a deal-maker and in...

item.title: Mount Semeru Erupts and Rains Ash on Villages
item.description: Mount Semeru on the island of Java is one of Indonesia’s most active volcanoes. Its latest eruption forced hundreds to flee their homes.

item.title: Ferry Crashed After Operator Was Distracted by His Phone, Officials Say
item.description: The operator and two other officers were charged with gross negligence after the ferry ran aground in South Korea on Wednesday carrying 267 people.

item.title: Move Over, Netflix: Ukraine’s Corruption Investigators Bring the Drama
item.description: The country’s anti-graft agencies have taken a cinematic approach to revealing a scandal that has touched President Volodymyr Zelensky’s inner circle.

item.title: Ex-Mayor Is Sentenced to Life for Human Trafficking Tied to Scam Centers
item.description: A court in the Philippines convicted Alice Guo for trafficking people to a compound that officials have linked to online scams and organized crime.
